claude.description: Claude Opus subagent via Task tool

diversity.description: Each advisor produces N orthogonal perspectives per question set. Orthogonal = genuinely different angles, NOT forced contrarian. Set enabled: false to revert to single-answer mode.

multi_llm_review.description: Extend multi-LLM advisory beyond planning into code review, test diagnosis, and debugging. External LLMs review first, findings fed into Claude primary reviewer for consolidation.
